text:
"PT Media Nusantara Citra" also known as MNC Media is the biggest group of the Southeast Asia. First being build and founded in 1997.
MNC has a core business, doing together wist RCTI, MNC TV, GTV, and iNews - as well as 18 channels aquired broadcast with MNC Vision (previously as IndoVision), under MNC Channels divison. MNC Media also has other media-based, like movies, radio, talent management, and production house.
Overview.
MNC has started founded in 1997, and has been listed on the Indonesian Stock Exchange (IDX), since June 22, 2007.
MNC Media has a biggest free-to-air TV market. The grouyp was also has three pay television, such as IndoVision, OkeVision, and Top TV. The company also created online media, like Okezone. And also excepting iNews, Koran Sindo newspaper, and portal sindonews.com
MNC News.
MNC News has first founded in 2006. Wich is a infotainment, sports, and lifestyle news channel. The channel as a part of 24 hours general, and has been seen on MNC Vision.
